description.p: On a battle field everyone fights for something, whether good or evil everyone has something that ignites the spark of passion. Paladins who take this oath thrive in the thick of war, searching for a good fight.
Violence Versus War. War is grand and glorious. Killing someone in a dark alley with a dagger, or poisoning their wine is not. Knot that difference and ensure you don't cross that line.
The Front Lines Await. Their is no honour in waiting behind the barricade. Wade nto the thick of battle and let your foes face your fury.
Always Be Prepared. Those who let their guard down died before they find glory. Always be ready to fight.
Fight Only The Worthy. You seek opponents, not victims. You should not bathe your blade in the blood of the weak, it will only grow nourished on the blood of the strong.

description.p: When you take this oath at 3rd level, you gain the following Channel Divinity options.

Champion Of War. As a bonus action, you can use your Channel Divinity to bless a creature within 30 feet of you with the power of battle. The creature has advantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Improved Warfare. As an action, you can use your Channel Divinity to glean information on a target within 30 feet of you. The creature must make an intelligence saving throw. On a failed save you learn the creatures type, immunities, resistances and vulnerabilities.

description.p: Starting at 15th level, once per turn when you land a weapon attack against a creature, you can additionally deal the weapons damage to another creature within 5ft of the attack's original target.
